altername_name: Behind Closed Doors Prequel: The Hut
name: Behind Closed Doors 0.25: The Hut
overview: A VERY short prequel to the first game in the series "Behind Closed Doors". Including this, there are now 10 games in the series. Good for beginners who are learning the difference between examine and search. This is a humorous text adventure and is good fun. Once again (or for the first time?) the Balrog is locked inside the loo. How can he get out? There is also an enhanced version of this game with the same name with classy colors like Magenta and other hues in the text. Still lacking in spoons and toast.
